Labels for Actionables

24 Nov 2024efficiency

Intro #

When tracking stories or tickets, these are some possible labels, for moving a ticket through the "next action" steps. Try to favor actionables when organizing your todos.

Categories of next action #

Categories of next action used at my workplace

  • Needs UX input
  • Needs PM review
  • Ready for schedule
  • Assigned
  • Backlog
  • Information Required
  • On hold
  • Pending prioritization
  • Scheduled in a sprint
  • Under triage
  • Blocked
  • In Review
  • Closed/Done
  • Won't fix
  • Next: Icebreakers
  • Previous: Working Remotely - Commuting


This is an Eleventy project created from the eleventy-base-blog repo If you discover these notes and find them useful I would love to hear from you at [Little Furnace](https://littlefurnace.com). Most of these are related to travel I did, books I read, or tech notes for Matomo and the LAMP stack.
